title: Test
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 2 lines representing Anthracite and bituminous, and Sub-bituminous and lignite.
The line for Anthracite and bituminous has the highest values across Year with a mean value of 552768.0,
and it peaked at 2016 with a value of 816214.0.
Sub-bituminous and lignite mostly had the least y-axis name with a mean value of 408736.0,
which peaked at 2014 with a value of 488332.0.
Sub-bituminous and lignite reported the lowest y-axis name  about 319879.0 in Year 2018
Overall Anthracite and bituminous is gradually increasing, Sub-bituminous and lignite is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The difference of y_axis name between Anthracite and bituminous and Sub-bituminous and lignite is greater at Year 2018 compared to the Year 2010.
The greatest difference of y_axis name between Anthracite and bituminous and Sub-bituminous and lignite occurs at Year 2016 and the smallest difference occurs at 2010.
